title: Summitsoft Logo Design Studio Pro Vector Edition 1.6.1 Inc Crack
description:
Summitsoft Logo Design Studio Pro Vector Edition 1.6.1

#1 Selling Logo Design Software for 15 Years. You know your business, we know logos. Over the years, millions of logos have been created with Logo Design Studio Pro. We partner with you and provide the tools, objects, inspirations, and guides you need to help you create a one-of-a-kind logo that is personal and professional. With countless tools and hundreds of options, there is no limit to what you can create! Let us show you how easy it is to make your first logo.

Create Your Logo
Start with your business name or one of the included templates and change the font.

With Professional Tools
Change the shape of the letters, add an object, and color.

In an Easy to Use Interface
Add other objects and change the background color.

With Professional Results
Adjust the colors, add some effects, and youÃ¢Â€â„¢re done!

Go Big with Vector Graphics
With Logo Design Studio Pro, you never have to worry about your logo looking fuzzy or pixelated when enlarged.

Unlimited Customization
Start with one of 2,000 customizable templates or one of the 6,000+ vector shapes, images, fonts, or graphics and use the advanced drawing tools to create your own completely unique shapes.

Incredible Special Effects
Add a creative touch using professional effects that get noticed. Lift your logo off the canvas with a shadow

Vector Tools
Vector designs are not limited to a specific size because they are made up of connected lines and curves, rather than a collection of pixels that make up raster designs.

Color and Gradients
You can pick colors from the color palette enter the exact hexidecimal as well as change both the gradient color and gradient direction of shapes and text for a variety of looks.

Total Text Control
Add standard, solid or stroked text, wrap text around shapes, place text on a path, or convert your text into an editable shape using Bezier tools.

Precise Drawing Tools
Bezier editing visually shows adjustable nodes you can move to change the look of shapes, text and curves. Easily undo any change you donÃ¢Â€â„¢t like.

Pre-built Objects
Over 2,000 industry-specific logo templates to fit your business. Customize with your own text and colors and then export to use anywhere
